title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8197 - Special Franchise Assessment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8197 - Special Franchise Assessment

State Regulations

Subpart 8197-2 - Reports (§ 8197-2.1 to 8197-2.12)

Subpart 8197-4 - Determination Of Special Franchise Assessments (§ 8197-4.1 to 8197-4.3)

Subpart 8197-5 - Miscellaneous Provisions (§ 8197-5.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8197

Statutory authority: Real Property Tax Law, §§ 200, 202[1][k], [l], 504, 600- 626, 1570; art. 6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
